name: Shifting Faces
summary: You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you.
description:
You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you. When you Change Shape into your tailless form, you gain the effects of 3rd-level illusory disguise for 1 hour or until you shift back, except it's a transmutation effect rather than an illusion.Traits

Kitsune: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.
